snippet: Alexei Ponikarovsky scored the winning goal at 17 minutes 21 seconds into overtime to give the Devils a 2-1 series lead against the Flyers.
abstract: New Jersey Devils defeat Philadelphia Flyers, 4-3, in overtime, to lead NHL Eastern Conference semifinals, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: Alexei Ponikarovsky scored the winning goal at 17 minutes 21 seconds into overtime to give the Devils a 2-1 series lead against the Flyers.

headline.seo: Stanley Cup: Devils Beat Flyers to Take 2-1 Lead
headline.main: Lead Slips Devils’ Grasp Twice, but They Grab It for Good in Overtime
headline.print_headline: After Losing Lead Twice, Devils Grab It for Good
